title: Expand Organic Farming Techniques page with more techniques and deeper content

requirements.summary: Expand the Organic Farming Techniques page to include 9 additional techniques with enriched content structure (step-by-step process, benefits, tools, and pro tips) for all 12 technique cards, displayed in a responsive animated grid
acceptanceCriteria: The Techniques page displays at least 12 technique cards in total (3 existing + 9 new).

Each technique card shows an emoji icon, technique name, overview description, step-by-step process (3â€“5 steps), benefits list (â‰¥3 bullet points), recommended tools section, and a pro tip callout.
The existing three cards (Composting, Pest Control, Crop Rotation) are enriched with the step-by-step process, benefits list, recommended tools, and pro tip sections.
All technique cards are displayed in a responsive grid (1 column on mobile, 2 on tablet, 3 on desktop).
Each card animates with slideUp on scroll entry via the AnimatedSection component.
The 'Explore Categories' CTA button remains visible at the bottom of the page.
No existing functionality (routing, animations, translations) is broken.
